isis.stitle: ANTILOCK BRAKES/TRACTION CONTROL: ROCKWELL WABCO 4 CHANNEL - TROUBLESHOOTING - TESTING COMPONENTS

svcprocinfo.para: If the blink codes or MPSI Pro-Link indicates a problem with an ABS or ABS/ATC component, always check the wiring or connections before replacing the component. In your preliminary check look for:

note.para: A test adapter is available that makes checking resistance across the harness pins easier.

caution.para: When troubleshooting and testing the ABS at the main ECU connector, be careful not to damage the electrical socket on the ECU connector.

svcsubproc.title: Ignition Voltage
svcsubproc.para: The ignition voltage to the frame mounted ECU should be measured between Pin 10 and Pin 12. Voltage should be between 11.0 and 15.0 v.

svcsubproc.title: Sensor Resistance
svcsubproc.para: The sensor circuit resistance should be 700-3000 ohms. This can be measured at the sensor when it is removed from the ECU, or right at the sensor when the extension is removed.

svcsubproc.title: ABS Valve
svcsubproc.para: The resistance across each valve solenoid coil terminal and the ground connector shown in Figure 13 must be 4.0 to 8.0 ohms.

item.para: If the resistance is greater than 8.0 ohms, clean the electrical contacts on the solenoid and check the resistance again.

To check the cable and ABS valve as one unit, measure across pins on the ECU connector of the cab harness. Refer to GROUP-08, Electrical Circuit Diagrams in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for pin number for the vehicle being serviced.

svcsubproc.title: ATC Valve
svcsubproc.para: The resistance across the two electrical terminals on the ATC valve should be 8.0 to 14.0 ohms ( Figure 14).

item.para: If the resistance is greater than 14.0 ohms, clean the electrical contacts on the solenoid and check the resistance again.

To check the cable and ATC valve as one unit, measure the resistance across pins. Refer to GROUP-08, Electrical Circuit Diagrams in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for the pin numbers for the vehicle being serviced.
